text: Sangal needs to research the company details for the client 'Smash', including founders, CEO, company base, operations, history, and registration status.
Jagan, Sangal, and Normal must research and compute pricing for various services.
Jagan needs to consolidate all the discussed research points.
Normal and Sangal must note down all discussed points and outline the next steps.
All team members should identify potential clients with issues from any industry globally and provide their names and email addresses for outreach.
Jagan and Sangal need to collect data on new gifting startups.
Katie needs to build and expand the team by hiring more members.
Sangal must type the meeting discussions into ChatGPT.
Manish should use Perplexity for research tasks.
Praveen should use Gemini for research tasks.
The team must create a comprehensive three-month strategy and budget plan, including financial targets and client acquisition plans.
The team needs to discuss the financial plan with AKK.
All team members must submit their one-week worksheet.
Sangal and Jagan must ensure all other assigned work is completed.
Normal needs to find more potential clients and opportunities.
Manish must inform HR not to send meeting links in group chats.
KK, Jagan, Sangal, and Pandore must continue the meeting and discuss any remaining details or questions.
Sangal needs to share the research document containing pricing data.
